description:
Tatebayashi and Senge (in cute form) square off in one of the Imperial Army`s meeting rooms. Senge sees that Tatebayashi is struggling, and says he`ll go after Kyoichiro himself. Ignorant of all this, Kyoichiro is returning home at evening, when he stumbles upon a few soldiers recovering a soul of the dead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: What Are Souls of the Dead?
